channel.title: Using gateway and workstation of different versions at the same time
channel.description: Is it possible to use a gateway and workstation that are of different versions simultaneously? For example, can a version 11.0.0.1.4 gateway be used with a version 13.0.0.1.4 workstation?

item.title: Using gateway and workstation of different versions at the same time
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Yes, for a multitude of reasons. Not knowing the results is one, using outdated (insecure) software another.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: Using gateway and workstation of different versions at the same time

item.title: Using gateway and workstation of different versions at the same time
item.dc:creator: fjlnwfjekjkrsv
item.description:
So are you saying that using an old one and a new one at the same time should not be done?

Read full topic
item.source: Using gateway and workstation of different versions at the same time

item.title: Using gateway and workstation of different versions at the same time
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Yes, because old versions are deprecated, unsupported and roughly no one looking into such old versions and combinations.

Read full topic
item.source: Using gateway and workstation of different versions at the same time

item.title: Using gateway and workstation of different versions at the same time
